title: ennaiyun aDiyanAi
sahitya:
annaiyun aDiyanAi EtraruLvAyO konrai malar punaiyum guNap-perum kunramE


anupallavi

  ponnaiyum bhuvi tarum bhOgangaL anaittaiyum eNNiyE uzhanriDum izhimanap-pEdaiyAm


caraNam    shAmbal magizhap-pUshi shaDaimuDi tarittavar pAmbaNI koNDavA panimalai amarndavA 
kAmanai erittavA kariyuri pOrttavA sOmanai aNIndavA sundara mUrtiyE
